name: Your Lovely Guide to Hell (DEMO)
description:
Your Lovely Guide to Hell

Have you ever thought about what the afterlife looks like? Religions picture it as a realm divided where a higher power decides on which side you get to live. Not on this one! 

Meet Dante, our old protagonist that after a long life of suffering and hardship, decides to voluntarily take an adventure to the underworld through ancient forbidden knowledge. He is on a mysterious quest, determined to face the dangers of this unknown world and to do everything within his power to achieve his goals. Nevertheless his trip will take another turn, as a young guide takes interest in him and decides to act as his compass throughout the journey.  

Join us in this Dantesque world inspired by the "Divine Comedy" filled with thrilling stories and terrifying monsters. Can Dante find what he is looking for in the realm of the dead?
